mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM TB_EVENT WHERE EVENT_KATE = 'N' AND DEL_GB = 'N')

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM TB_EVENT WHERE EVENT_KATE = 'Y' AND DEL_GB = 'N')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EVENT_APPLY ( EVENT_APPLY_NUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, USER_ID ) VALUES ( TB_EVENT_APPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{EVENT_INDEX}, #{EVENT_TITLE}, #{USER_ID} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select rownum as RNUM, s.* FROM(SELECT A.EVENT_APPLY_NUM, A.EVENT_INDEX, M.USER_ID, E.EVENT_TITLE, A.EVENT_WIN FROM TB_EVENT_APPLY A, TB_MEMBER M, TB_EVENT E WHERE M.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND E.EVENT_TITLE = A.EVENT_TITLE )s) WHERE RNUM >= '0' AND RNUM <= '10'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EVENT( EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_SIZE ) VALUES( TB_EVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{EVENT_TITLE}, #{EVENT_CONTENT}, #{EVENT_IMG}, #{EVENT_THUMB}, #{EVENT_SIZE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_EVENT SET EVENT_KATE = #{EVENT_KATE}, EVENT_TITLE = #{EVENT_TITLE}, EVENT_CONTENT = #{EVENT_CONTENT}, EVENT_IMG = #{EVENT_IMG}, EVENT_THUMB = #{EVENT_THUMB}, EVENT_SIZE = #{EVENT_SIZE} WHERE EVENT_INDEX = #{EVENT_INDEX}
